quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Nobody hate upcomers pass celeb wey don dey struggle.
author: Ohanz De Hyper

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Nothing Dey Streetz. Meaning, Have low or no expections when you go outdoor.
author: Ohanz De Hyper

quote: Love sweet oh, being in love is sweeter. Buh dey use your head, dem must reciprocate
author: ODH

quote: Remember, there's no new month, it's just another day. Except if you like to conform to the standards of the world, feel free. Else, keep doing, keep hypeing.
author: ODC

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Age is just a number, but no forget seh too much overload no dey good.
author: ODH
